verses.verse: Then said <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> unto <WH413> me, Go <WH1980> yet, <WH5750> love <WH157> a woman <WH802> beloved <WH157> of her friend, <WH7453> yet an adulteress, <WH5003> according to the love <WH160> of the LORD <WH3068> toward <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> who <WH1992> look <WH6437> to <WH413> other <WH312> gods, <WH430> and love <WH157> flagons <WH809> of wine. <WH6025>
So I bought <WH3739> her to me for fifteen <WH2568> <WH6240> pieces of silver, <WH3701> and for a homer <WH2563> of barley, <WH8184> and a half homer <WH3963> of barley: <WH8184>

And I said <WH559> unto <WH413> her, Thou shalt abide <WH3427> for me many <WH7227> days; <WH3117> thou shalt not <WH3808> play the harlot, <WH2181> and thou shalt not <WH3808> be <WH1961> for another man: <WH376> so will I <WH589> also <WH1571> be for <WH413> thee.

For <WH3588> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall abide <WH3427> many <WH7227> days <WH3117> without <WH369> a king, <WH4428> and without <WH369> a prince, <WH8269> and without <WH369> a sacrifice, <WH2077> and without <WH369> an image, <WH4676> and without <WH369> an ephod, <WH646> and without teraphim: <WH8655>

Afterward <WH310> shall the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> return, <WH7725> and seek <WH1245> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> their God, <WH430> and David <WH1732> their king; <WH4428> and shall fear <WH6342> <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> and his goodness <WH2898> in the latter <WH319> days. <WH3117>
